Text: frenchmichaels, i do belive it must have something to do with your comp/media player or something. 33 other peeps are seeding and no complains, ive just dl`d it myself and it works nicly.

It does work, I have noticed the sound is a bit low on my PS3, but I just turn it up a bit. Picture is great though

You're right, Nick.  NO idea why it would do that since the volume on the PC playback is fine.  The volume is normal when streaming through TVersity as well.  But when put on a thumb drive or CD and played on the PS3, the volume is reduced.  *scratches head*  Hellifiknow.   But opening the video control panel (press Triangle) and set the Volume Control up to +3 or 4, it's just fine.
